meanings.sent1: She is always gripey about the weather.
meanings.sent2: The gripey customer returned to the store to complain again.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed gripey today, meowing at every little thing.
meanings.sent4: The old house had a gripey floorboard that creaked with every step.
meanings.sent5: The gripey tone in his voice made it clear he was not happy.

meanings.definition: Characterized by frequent complaints or grumbling
meanings.sent1: The gripey neighbor was always unhappy with something.
meanings.sent2: Her gripey attitude made it hard to enjoy the family gathering.
meanings.sent3: The gripey dog barked at the mailman every morning without fail.
meanings.sent4: The gripey engine of the old car sputtered and coughed along the road.
meanings.sent5: The gripey clouds seemed to grumble as they covered the sky.
